OTHER PARTIES

Table of Contents

 

 

Do you remember the scenario?

 

 

Apart from the HSR, who else can request that a health and safety committee be formed?

Scenario

 

Accounting Solutions has recently moved to new offices.

 

The new offices are bigger than the previous premises, but also older. The carpets are old and falling apart. There is no kitchen, so a kettle and microwave have been set up on the secretary's desk.

 

The employees feel this is not a safe workplace. Recently, an employee tripped over loose threads from the carpet, causing the employee to fall and hit his head on a cabinet.

 

Debbie, a junior with the firm, has approached management with a request to hold an election for a health and safety representative (HSR) who can represent employees at Accounting Solutions. Debbie has told her co-workers that an HSR will help them resolve their concerns about the new premises with management. She has also mentioned that, under the workplace health and safety laws, they may request that a health and safety committee be established.

Debbie

A group of five or more workers

The PCBU

 
 
 

That is incorrect

 

A group of five or more workers or an HSR may request that a PCBU establish a health and safety committee.

That is correct!

 

A group of five or more workers or an HSR may request that a PCBU establish a health and safety committee.

That is incorrect

 

A group of five or more workers or an HSR may request that a PCBU establish a health and safety committee.
